# Convex UI Library
Last updated: 2026-01-30T22:34:25.513Z

## Overview
A collection of beautifully designed, accessible, and fully-featured UI components for building applications with Convex. Built on top of shadcn/ui design patterns with realtime components, authentication flows, and file storage - all powered by Convex.

## Docs

### Getting Started

- [FAQ](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/faq) - Frequently asked questions about Convex UI
- [Introduction](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/introduction) - A flexible, open-source, React-based UI component library built on shadcn/ui, designed to simplify Convex-powered projects with pre-built Auth, Storage, and Realtime features.
- [Quick Start](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/getting-started/quickstart) - Get up and running with Convex UI in under 5 minutes

### Next.js Components

- [Convex Client](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/nextjs/client) - Convex client for Next.js
- [Current User Avatar](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/nextjs/current-user-avatar) - Convex Auth-aware avatar component
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/nextjs/dropzone) - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to Convex Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/nextjs/password-based-auth) - Password-based authentication block for Next.js
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/nextjs/realtime-avatar-stack) - Avatar stack showing online users in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/nextjs/realtime-chat) - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/nextjs/realtime-cursor) - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/nextjs/social-auth) - Social authentication block for Next.js

### React (Vite) Components

- [Convex Client](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react/client) - Convex client for React Single Page Applications
- [Current User Avatar](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react/current-user-avatar) - Convex Auth-aware avatar component
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react/dropzone) - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to Convex Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react/password-based-auth) - Password-based authentication block for React Single Page Applications
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react/realtime-avatar-stack) - Avatar stack showing online users in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react/realtime-chat) - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react/realtime-cursor) - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react/social-auth) - Social authentication block for React Single Page Applications

### React Router Components

- [Convex Client](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react-router/client) - Convex client for React Router
- [Current User Avatar](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react-router/current-user-avatar) - Convex Auth-aware avatar component
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react-router/dropzone) - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to Convex Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react-router/password-based-auth) - Password-based authentication block for React Router
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react-router/realtime-avatar-stack) - Avatar stack showing online users in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react-router/realtime-chat) - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react-router/realtime-cursor) - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/react-router/social-auth) - Social authentication block for React Router

### TanStack Start Components

- [Convex Client](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/tanstack/client) - Convex client for TanStack Start
- [Current User Avatar](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/tanstack/current-user-avatar) - Convex Auth-aware avatar component
- [Dropzone (File Upload)](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/tanstack/dropzone) - Displays a control for easier uploading of files directly to Convex Storage
- [Password-based Authentication](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/tanstack/password-based-auth) - Password-based authentication block for TanStack Start
- [Realtime Avatar Stack](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/tanstack/realtime-avatar-stack) - Avatar stack showing online users in realtime
- [Realtime Chat](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/tanstack/realtime-chat) - Real-time chat component for collaborative applications
- [Realtime Cursor](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/tanstack/realtime-cursor) - Real-time cursor sharing for collaborative applications
- [Social Authentication](https://convex-ui.vercel.app/docs/tanstack/social-auth) - Social authentication block for TanStack Start
